purpose.listsidactions: List the actions on a list
purpose.listsidfield: Get a specific property of a list
purpose.listsidboard: Get the board a list is on
purpose.listsidcards: List the cards in a list
purpose.listsid-1: Update the properties of a list
purpose.listsididboard: Move a list to a new board
purpose.listsidpos: Change the position of a list
purpose.listsidsoftlimit: Set a soft limit for number of cards in the list
purpose.listsidsubscribed: Subscribe or unsubscribe from a list
purpose.lists-1: Create a new list on a board
purpose.listsidarchiveallcards: Archive all cards in a list
purpose.listsidmoveallcards: Move all cards in a list
